ygData.subject: Re: Finding these things!(Also some other questions  :P)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, your skill in 2h blunt will rise...just keep swinging away every chance you get (you have the right idea).  Runed Totem Staffs (RTS) are auctioned alot
ygData.messageBody:
Well, your skill in 2h blunt will rise...just keep swinging away every
chance you get (you have the right idea). Runed Totem Staffs (RTS) are
auctioned alot for around 20pp. I sold my last one for 18pp. Staff
mounting? who knows...that is a great mystery so far.

I do not know any bakers...keep on fishing. Fishcakes are great food to
take withyou as they weight little and cost little (although you consume
them quicker).

- Ziffnab

-----Original Message-----
From: SuperFreak [mailto:supermario@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 10:51 AM
To: -eq_wizards@onelist.com-
Subject: [eq_wizards] Finding these things!(Also some other questions
:P)


From: SuperFreak <supermario@...>

Hey ppl, I was just wondering if you could tell me something about the
following...
Oh, and BTW, how the frick to get my 2Handblunt skill better? Group up
and fight things that con yellow to me only using my staff but then use
mana when it starts getting tough?:
1) Where do I find the Runed Totem Staff
2) Where do I find any Staff mountings for this staff(I hear they have
GREAT bonuses!)
3) Are there any other magic rings than the Cutthroat Insignia rings or
Onynx Earrings, and if so, what do they do and where the heck do I get
them?
4) Is Cooking a hard skill? seeing I am a fisherman, is it easier(money
wise) to sell the fish(or whatever I catch) to the merchant and buy my
own food, or is it less expensive to just learn the cooking skill and
cook it up myself(oh, yeah, do I even usually get fish? eheheh, if my
skill goes up do I catch better fish or some rare items or what?)
Thx for all your help!
-Malvos the Wizard of all Seasons on The Rathe
